arts.ttl: Match Officials Mic'd Up: Webb analyses key incidents in MW1-3
arts.sum: What the match officials did: Referee Chris Kavanagh spots that Rice kicks the ball away before Veltman catches him, he then issues Rice a second yellow card for delaying the restart of play. What the match officials did: The assistant referee says the ball strikes Kovacic but believes his arm is in a natural position and the ball comes at him at speed.

arts.ttl: Everton exit Carabao Cup as Southampton prevail on penalties
arts.sum: Everton suffered another blow in their troubled start to the season as they were knocked out of the Carabao Cup on penalties by fellow Premier League strugglers Southampton following a 1-1 draw at Goodison Park.

arts.ttl: Everton misery continues as boos ring out in painful Carabao Cup defeat
arts.sum: EVERTON 1-1 SOUTHAMPTON (5-6 PENS): Everton's winless start to the season continued on Tuesday night with a penalty shoot-out defeat against Southampton in the Carabao Cup
